Uses of Package
co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator

  • Packages that use co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator 
    Package Description
    co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator
    The calculator package providing classes to calculate requested amortization schedule based on different calculation methods.
    co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui
    This package contains classes for the "User Interface", a CLI-like backed by a Scanner.
  • Classes in co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator used by co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator 
    Class Description
    AbstractCalculator
    An abstract calculator implementing the AbstractCalculator.calculate() method as a template method.
    Calculator
    Exposes a single calculate method.
    Payment
    Represents a periodic payment.
    Payment.Builder
    A builder to build Payment instances.
    Request
    Represents a schedule request.
    Request.Builder
    A builder to build Request instances.
    Schedule
    Represents an amortization schedule.
    Schedule.Builder
    A builder to build Schedule instances.
    ScheduleMethod
    The enumeration of Schedule calculation methods providing a fabric method.
  • Classes in co.simplon.p25.loaning.calculator used by co.simplon.p25.loaning.ui 
    Class Description
    Request
    Represents a schedule request.
    Schedule
    Represents an amortization schedule.
    ScheduleMethod
    The enumeration of Schedule calculation methods providing a fabric method.
